data.name: Don't Download this DLC 3

Dont Download This DLC !!! No USE !!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 Dual-Core CPU 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 Quad-Core CPU 2.6 GHz or equivalent AMD CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 Dual-Core CPU 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 Quad-Core CPU 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.1
  • Processor: Dual Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.1
  • Processor: Dual Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

  • Storage: 400 MB available space
